abstract: Is there a way to get the proper accents on non-English words without having to use the Symbol menu in Microsoft Word?
snippet: Is there a way to get the proper accents on non-English words without having to use the Symbol menu in Microsoft Word?
lead_paragraph: Q. Is there a way to get the proper accents on non-English words without having to use the Symbol menu in Microsoft Word?

abstract: With Yahoo‘s appointment of Carol Bartz as its new chief, talk, perhaps inevitably, resurfaced that the search giant might reopen talks with Microsoft about some kind of deal.
lead_paragraph: With Yahoo‘s appointment of Carol Bartz as its new chief, talk, perhaps inevitably, resurfaced that the search giant might reopen talks with Microsoft about some kind of deal.

headline.main: Yahoo Chief Says Instinct Is to Keep Search Unit, Report Says

abstract: Yahoo shares fell Thursday after Carol Bartz, the new chief executive, said she is not convinced that Yahoo should sell its search business to Microsoft.
snippet: Yahoo shares fell Thursday after Carol Bartz, the new chief executive, said she is not convinced that Yahoo should sell its search business to Microsoft.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street didn’t take kindly to comments by Carol Bartz, Yahoo’s new chief executive, made at a companywide meeting Wednesday. After reports that Ms. Bartz wasn’t sold on the idea of selling Yahoo’s search business to Microsoft, investors sent Yahoo shares plunging 6.5 percent on Thursday.

headline.main: Yahoo Shares Fall on C.E.O.’s Comments
